SELECT l.id, l.parentId, l.externalId, l.type, l.base_map, l.groupId,
l.name, l.url, l.locale,
l.opacity, l.style, l.minscale, l.maxscale,
l.legend_image, l.metadataId,
l.tile_matrix_set_id, l.params, l.options, l.attributes, l.capabilities,
l.gfi_xslt, l.gfi_type, l.gfi_content, l.realtime, l.refresh_rate, l.username, l.password, l.version, l.srs_name, m.wkt as geom,
l.created, l.updated,
l.capabilities_last_updated AS capabilitiesLastUpdated, l.capabilities_update_rate_sec AS capabilitiesUpdateRateSec
FROM oskari_maplayer l LEFT OUTER JOIN oskari_maplayer_metadata m ON m.metadataid = l.metadataId WHERE l.id = #id# OR l.parentId = #id# ORDER BY l.parentId ASC

sqlMap.statement: delete from oskari_maplayer where parentId=#id# AND parentId <> -1; delete from oskari_maplayer where id=#id#;

insert into oskari_maplayer ( parentId, type, base_map, groupId,
name, url, locale,
opacity, style, minscale, maxscale,
legend_image, metadataId,
tile_matrix_set_id, params, options, attributes, capabilities,
gfi_xslt, gfi_type, gfi_content,
realtime, refresh_rate,
username, password,
version, srs_name,
created, updated,
capabilities_last_updated, capabilities_update_rate_sec)
values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,#capabilitiesLastUpdated#,#capabilitiesUpdateRateSec#)

UPDATE oskari_maplayer SET parentId = ?, base_map = ?, groupId = ?,
name = ?, url = ?, locale = ?,
opacity = ?, style = ?, minscale = ?, maxscale = ?,
legend_image = ?, metadataId = ?,
tile_matrix_set_id = ?, params = ?, options = ?, attributes = ?, capabilities = ?,
gfi_xslt = ?, gfi_type=?, gfi_content=?,
realtime = ?, refresh_rate = ?,
username = ?, password = ?,
version = ?, srs_name = ?,
updated=?,
capabilities_last_updated=#capabilitiesLastUpdated#, capabilities_update_rate_sec=#capabilitiesUpdateRateSec#
WHERE id = ?
